mapper.select: SELECT VA_SVC_ID as vaSvcId , SPRT_YEAR as sprtYear, VA_TYPE_CD vaTypeCd , VA_SVC_NM vaSvcNm , APP_PKG_ID appPkgId , REG_PGM_ID regPgmId , MDF_PGM_ID mdfPgmId, REGR_ID regrId, REG_DT regDt , MDFR_ID mdfrId , MDF_DT mdfDt FROM TMVA_VA_SVC_M

SELECT VA_CNTR_ID as vaCntrId, VA_SVC_ID vaSvcId , CNTR_CD as cntrCd, DFLT_TZN_LANG_CD as dfltTznLangCd, REG_PGM_ID as regPgmId, MDF_PGM_ID as mdfPgmId, REGR_ID as regrId, REG_DT as regDt, MDFR_ID as mdfrId, MDF_DT as mdfDt FROM TMVA_VA_CNTR_L WHERE VA_SVC_ID = #{vaSvcId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMVA_VA_SVC_M ( VA_SVC_ID , SPRT_YEAR , VA_TYPE_CD , VA_SVC_NM , APP_PKG_ID , REG_PGM_ID , MDF_PGM_ID , REGR_ID , REG_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(VA_SVC_ID) + 1 FROM (SELECT VA_SVC_ID FROM TMVA_VA_SVC_M ) AS TEMP), #{year} , 'bixby', #{serviceName} , #{appPackage} , 'admin', 'admin', 'admin', now(), 'admin', now() )
mapper.select: SELECT BowlerID AS bowlerID , BowlerLastName AS bowlerLastName , BowlerFirstName AS bowlerFirstName , BowlerMiddleInit AS bowlerMiddleInit , BowlerAddress AS bowlerAddress , BowlerCity AS bowlerCity , BowlerState AS bowlerState , BowlerZip AS bowlerZip , BowlerPhoneNumber AS bowlerPhoneNumber , TeamID AS teamID FROM BOWLERS
